```{r echo=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
data(midwest)
plot_ly(data = midwest, x = ~percollege, color = ~state, type = "box")

num1 <- 1:10
num2 <- 1:10
nums <- data.frame(num1, num2)
shitty.plot <- plot_ly(nums, x = ~num1, type = "scatter")
shitty.plot

styled.scatterplot <- plot_ly(nums, x = ~num1, type = "scatter", marker = list(size = 10, color = "red", line = list(color = "blue", width = 2))) %>% 
  layout(title = "Crazy Numbers Bruh!", 
         xaxis = list(title = "Some crazy numbers",
        zeroline = FALSE),
        yaxis = list(title = "Some even crazier numbers", zeroline = FALSE)
         )
styled.scatterplot

diamond.data <- diamonds[sample(nrow(diamonds), 1000), ]

plot_ly(diamond.data, x = ~carat, y = ~price, z = ~depth) %>% add_markers(text = ~paste("Claryity:", clarity))
```
